title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions:
Unleash your inner engineer with the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers Science & Engineering Kit! This Parents' Choice Gold Award-winning, intermediate-level kit lets you build 20 incredible models, including truss, arch, cantilever, rope, and suspension bridges, and skyscrapers using 285 high-quality pieces.

Dive into the world of structural engineering and discover the secrets behind the force, load, compression, and tension that keep our buildings standing tall. Explore a variety of structural elements such as columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary, and learn about the different force types like tension, compression, shear, and bending.

With a comprehensive 36-page, full-color illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide, you'll be guided through a series of 20 model-building experiments that will teach you about mechanical physics, structural engineering, the strength and stability of structures, the strength and stiffness of materials, and optimization for safety and cost.

This kit is perfect for anyone interested in architecture, engineering, or physics, and it's a great way to learn about these fascinating subjects in a hands-on, engaging way. So why wait? Order your Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers Science & Engineering Kit today and start building your future as a structural engineer!
